step.name: Production BOM Header
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[No_], a.[Description], a.[Description 2], a.[Search Name], a.[Unit of Measure Code], a.[Low-Level Code], a.[Creation Date], a.[Last Date Modified], a.[Status], a.[Version Nos_], a.[No_ Series], a.[Type], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Production BOM Header] as a where cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: Production BOM Line
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Production BOM No_], a.[Version Code], a.[Line No_], a.[Type], a.[No_], a.[Description], a.[Unit of Measure Code], a.[Quantity], a.[Position], a.[Position 2], a.[Position 3], a.[Lead-Time Offset], a.[Routing Link Code], a.[Scrap _], a.[Variant Code], a.[Starting Date], a.[Ending Date], a.[Length], a.[Width], a.[Weight], a.[Depth], a.[Calculation Formula], a.[Quantity per], a.[Fitting Note], a.[Parcel Code], a.[Randament _], a.[Rebut _], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Production BOM Line] as a inner join [dbo].[Live_any$Production BOM Header] as b on a.[Production BOM No_] = b.[No_] where cast(b.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: Production BOM Version
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Production BOM No_], a.[Version Code], a.[Description], a.[Starting Date], a.[Unit of Measure Code], a.[Last Date Modified], a.[Status], a.[No_ Series], a.[Location Code], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Production BOM Version] as a inner join [dbo].[Live_any$Production BOM Header] as b on a.[Production BOM No_] = b.[No_] where cast(b.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: Routing Header
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[No_], a.[Description], a.[Description 2], a.[Search Description], a.[Last Date Modified], a.[Status], a.[Type], a.[Version Nos_], a.[No_ Series], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Routing Header] as a where cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: Routing Line
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Routing No_], a.[Version Code], a.[Operation No_], a.[Next Operation No_], a.[Previous Operation No_], a.[Type], a.[No_], a.[Work Center No_], a.[Work Center Group Code], a.[Description], a.[Setup Time], a.[Run Time], a.[Wait Time], a.[Move Time], a.[Fixed Scrap Quantity], a.[Lot Size], a.[Scrap Factor _], a.[Setup Time Unit of Meas_ Code], a.[Run Time Unit of Meas_ Code], a.[Wait Time Unit of Meas_ Code], a.[Move Time Unit of Meas_ Code], a.[Minimum Process Time], a.[Maximum Process Time], a.[Concurrent Capacities], a.[Send-Ahead Quantity], a.[Routing Link Code], a.[Standard Task Code], a.[Unit Cost per], a.[Recalculate], a.[Sequence No_ (Forward)], a.[Sequence No_ (Backward)], a.[Fixed Scrap Qty_ (Accum_)], a.[Scrap Factor _ (Accumulated)], a.[Machine Efficiency (_)], a.[No_ Of Workers], a.[Net Setup Time], a.[Net Run Time], a.[Description 2], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Routing Line] as a inner join [dbo].[Live_any$Routing Header] as b on a.[Routing No_] = b.[No_] where cast(b.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: Routing Version
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Routing No_], a.[Version Code], a.[Description], a.[Starting Date], a.[Status], a.[Type], a.[Last Date Modified], a.[No_ Series], a.[Location Code], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Routing Version] as a inner join [dbo].[Live_any$Routing Header] as b on a.[Routing No_] = b.[No_] where cast(b.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: Item Technical Family
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Code], a.[Description], a.[Description 2], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Technical Family_] as a where cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: BOM Component
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], [Parent Item No_], [Line No_], [Type], [No_], [Description], [Unit of Measure Code], [Quantity per], [Position], [Position 2], [Position 3], [Machine No_], [Lead-Time Offset], [Resource Usage Type], [Variant Code], [Installed in Line No_], [Installed in Item No_], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$BOM Component] as a;

step.name: Production Order

step.name: Production Order Line
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Status], a.[Prod_ Order No_], a.[Line No_], a.[Item No_], a.[Variant Code], a.[Description], a.[Description 2], a.[Location Code], a.[Shortcut Dimension 1 Code], a.[Shortcut Dimension 2 Code], a.[Bin Code], a.[Quantity], a.[Finished Quantity], a.[Remaining Quantity], a.[Scrap _], a.[Due Date], a.[Starting Date], a.[Starting Time], a.[Ending Date], a.[Ending Time], a.[Planning Level Code], a.[Priority], a.[Production BOM No_], a.[Routing No_], a.[Inventory Posting Group], a.[Routing Reference No_], a.[Unit Cost], a.[Cost Amount], a.[Unit of Measure Code], a.[Quantity (Base)], a.[Finished Qty_ (Base)], a.[Remaining Qty_ (Base)], a.[Starting Date-Time], a.[Ending Date-Time], a.[Dimension Set ID], a.[Cost Amount (ACY)], a.[Unit Cost (ACY)], a.[Production BOM Version Code], a.[Routing Version Code], a.[Routing Type], a.[Qty_ per Unit of Measure], a.[MPS Order], a.[Planning Flexibility], a.[Indirect Cost _], a.[Overhead Rate], a.[Responsability Center], a.[Confim Production date], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Prod_ Order Line] as a inner join [dbo].[Live_any$Production Order] as b on a.[Status] = b.[Status] and a.[Prod_ Order No_] = b.[No_] where cast(b.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: Production Order Component
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Status], a.[Prod_ Order No_], a.[Prod_ Order Line No_], a.[Line No_], a.[Item No_], a.[Description], a.[Unit of Measure Code], a.[Quantity], a.[Position], a.[Position 2], a.[Position 3], a.[Lead-Time Offset], a.[Routing Link Code], a.[Scrap _], a.[Variant Code], a.[Expected Quantity], a.[Remaining Quantity], a.[Flushing Method], a.[Location Code], a.[Shortcut Dimension 1 Code], a.[Shortcut Dimension 2 Code], a.[Bin Code], a.[Supplied-by Line No_], a.[Planning Level Code], a.[Item Low-Level Code], a.[Length], a.[Width], a.[Weight], a.[Depth], a.[Calculation Formula], a.[Quantity per], a.[Unit Cost], a.[Cost Amount], a.[Due Date], a.[Due Time], a.[Qty_ per Unit of Measure], a.[Remaining Qty_ (Base)], a.[Quantity (Base)], a.[Expected Qty_ (Base)], a.[Due Date-Time], a.[Dimension Set ID], a.[Original Item No_], a.[Original Variant Code], a.[Qty_ Picked], a.[Qty_ Picked (Base)], a.[Completely Picked], a.[Direct Unit Cost], a.[Indirect Cost _], a.[Overhead Rate], a.[Direct Cost Amount], a.[Overhead Amount], a.[Reserv semif], a.[BOM Quantity per], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Prod_ Order Component] as a inner join [dbo].[Live_any$Production Order] as b on a.[Status] = b.[Status] and a.[Prod_ Order No_] = b.[No_] where cast(b.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: Production Order Routing Line
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Status], a.[Prod_ Order No_], a.[Routing Reference No_], a.[Routing No_], a.[Operation No_], a.[Next Operation No_], a.[Previous Operation No_], a.[Type], a.[No_], a.[Work Center No_], a.[Work Center Group Code], a.[Description], a.[Setup Time], a.[Run Time], a.[Wait Time], a.[Move Time], a.[Fixed Scrap Quantity], a.[Lot Size], a.[Scrap Factor _], a.[Setup Time Unit of Meas_ Code], a.[Run Time Unit of Meas_ Code], a.[Wait Time Unit of Meas_ Code], a.[Move Time Unit of Meas_ Code], a.[Minimum Process Time], a.[Maximum Process Time], a.[Concurrent Capacities], a.[Send-Ahead Quantity], a.[Routing Link Code], a.[Standard Task Code], a.[Unit Cost per], a.[Recalculate], a.[Sequence No_ (Forward)], a.[Sequence No_ (Backward)], a.[Fixed Scrap Qty_ (Accum_)], a.[Scrap Factor _ (Accumulated)], a.[Sequence No_ (Actual)], a.[Direct Unit Cost], a.[Indirect Cost _], a.[Overhead Rate], a.[Starting Time], a.[Starting Date], a.[Ending Time], a.[Ending Date], a.[Unit Cost Calculation], a.[Input Quantity], a.[Critical Path], a.[Routing Status], a.[Flushing Method], a.[Expected Operation Cost Amt_], a.[Expected Capacity Need], a.[Expected Capacity Ovhd_ Cost], a.[Starting Date-Time], a.[Ending Date-Time], a.[Schedule Manually], a.[Location Code], a.[Open Shop Floor Bin Code], a.[To-Production Bin Code], a.[From-Production Bin Code], a.[Seq], a.[No_of Workers], a.[Estim Machine Time], a.[Estim Workers Time], a.[Description 2], a.[DR Run Time], a.[Net Run Time], a.[Machine Efficiency (_)], a.[Routing Version Code], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Prod_ Order Routing Line] as a inner join [dbo].[Live_any$Production Order] as b on a.[Status] = b.[Status] and a.[Prod_ Order No_] = b.[No_] where cast(b.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: Purchase Price
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Item No_], a.[Vendor No_], a.[Starting Date], a.[Currency Code], a.[Variant Code], a.[Unit of Measure Code], a.[Minimum Quantity], a.[Location Code], a.[Direct Unit Cost], a.[Ending Date], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Purchase Price] as a where cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: Sales Price
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Item No_], a.[Sales Type], a.[Sales Code], a.[Starting Date], a.[Currency Code], a.[Variant Code], a.[Unit of Measure Code], a.[Minimum Quantity], a.[Unit Price], a.[Price Includes VAT], a.[Allow Invoice Disc_], a.[VAT Bus_ Posting Gr_ (Price)], a.[Ending Date], a.[Allow Line Disc_], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Sales Price] as a where cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: Item unit of measure
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Item No_], a.[Code], a.[Qty_ per Unit of Measure], a.[Length], a.[Width], a.[Height], a.[Cubage], a.[Weight], a.[Packaging Weight], a.[Expanded Polystyren weight], a.[Thinkness], a.[Box weight], a.[Stripe carton weight], a.[Paper weight], a.[Foil weight], a.[PFL_PAL_MDF weight], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Item Unit of Measure] as a where cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: Item Ledger Entry

step.name: Value Entry

step.name: Customer

inceput TVA], a.[Data sfarsit TVA], a.[Data sfarsit TVA de plata], a.[Inactiv], a.[Data inactivare], a.[Data Reactivare], a.[Data anulare Split TVA], a.[VAT to Pay], a.[Registru Plati Defalcate], step.name: Customer Price Group
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Code], a.[Price Includes VAT], a.[Allow Invoice Disc_], a.[VAT Bus_ Posting Gr_ (Price)], a.[Description], a.[Allow Line Disc_], a.[Pub Delivery Interval], a.[RDV Report text], a.[Std Delivery Interval], a.[EDI Posted Inv_ Export], a.[DESADV_req], a.[INVOIC_req], a.[ORDRSP_req], a.[Tip rutare], a.[Invoice FTP link], a.[User FTP], a.[Password FTP], a.[RFA _], a.[Shipment FTP link], a.[PAR_BY], a.[Invoice Bank 2], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Customer Price Group] as a where cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: Warehouse Entry
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Entry No_], a.[Journal Batch Name], a.[Line No_], a.[Registering Date], a.[Location Code], a.[Zone Code], a.[Bin Code], a.[Description], a.[Item No_], a.[Quantity], a.[Qty_ (Base)], a.[Source Type], a.[Source Subtype], a.[Source No_], a.[Source Line No_], a.[Source Subline No_], a.[Source Document], a.[Source Code], a.[Reason Code], a.[No_ Series], a.[Bin Type Code], a.[Cubage], a.[Weight], a.[Journal Template Name], a.[Whse_ Document No_], a.[Whse_ Document Type], a.[Whse_ Document Line No_], a.[Entry Type], a.[Reference Document], a.[Reference No_], a.[User ID], a.[Variant Code], a.[Qty_ per Unit of Measure], a.[Unit of Measure Code], a.[Serial No_], a.[Lot No_], a.[Warranty Date], a.[Expiration Date], a.[Phys Invt Counting Period Code], a.[Phys Invt Counting Period Type], a.[Dedicated], a.[Pallet No_], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Warehouse Entry] as a where a.[Entry No_] > ?;

step.name: Change Log Entry
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Entry No_], a.[Date and Time], a.[Time], a.[User ID], a.[Table No_], a.[Field No_], a.[Type of Change], a.[Old Value], a.[New Value], a.[Primary Key], a.[Primary Key Field 1 No_], a.[Primary Key Field 1 Value], a.[Primary Key Field 2 No_], a.[Primary Key Field 2 Value], a.[Primary Key Field 3 No_], a.[Primary Key Field 3 Value], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Change Log Entry] as a where a.[Entry No_] > ? and ((a.[Table No_] = 5407 and a.[Field No_] = 19) or (a.[Table No_] = 5407 and a.[Field No_] = 45) or (a.[Table No_] = 5409 and a.[Field No_] = 34));

step.name: Capacity Ledger Entry
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Entry No_], a.[No_], a.[Posting Date], a.[Type], a.[Document No_], a.[Description], a.[Operation No_], a.[Work Center No_], a.[Quantity], a.[Setup Time], a.[Run Time], a.[Stop Time], a.[Invoiced Quantity], a.[Output Quantity], a.[Scrap Quantity], a.[Concurrent Capacity], a.[Cap_ Unit of Measure Code], a.[Qty_ per Cap_ Unit of Measure], a.[Global Dimension 1 Code], a.[Global Dimension 2 Code], a.[Last Output Line], a.[Completely Invoiced], a.[Starting Time], a.[Ending Time], a.[Routing No_], a.[Routing Reference No_], a.[Item No_], a.[Variant Code], a.[Unit of Measure Code], a.[Qty_ per Unit of Measure], a.[Document Date], a.[External Document No_], a.[Stop Code], a.[Scrap Code], a.[Work Center Group Code], a.[Work Shift Code], a.[Subcontracting], a.[Order Type], a.[Order No_], a.[Order Line No_], a.[Dimension Set ID], a.[No_ Of Workers], a.[Workers Qty_], a.[Employee No_], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Capacity Ledger Entry] as a where a.[Entry No_] > ?;

step.name: Machine Production Declaration
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Machine Center No_], a.[Date], a.[Work Shift], a.[Declaration Status], a.[Responsibility Center], a.[Location Code], a.[Created By], a.[Validated By], a.[Employee No_], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Machine Production Declaration] as a where cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: Machine Production Declaration Lines
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Machine Center No_], a.[Date], a.[Work Shift], a.[Line No_], a.[Prod_ Order No_], a.[Prod_ Order Line], a.[Routing No_], a.[Operation No_], a.[Prod_ Order Item No_], a.[Setup Start], a.[Setup End], a.[Run Start], a.[Run End], a.[Runtime Min_], a.[Setup Time Min_], a.[Conf_ Qty_], a.[Scrap Qty_], a.[No_of Workers], a.[Time per Piece], a.[Scrap Code], a.[Scrap Commets], a.[Repair Code], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Machine Production Declar_Line] as a inner join [dbo].[Live_any$Machine Production Declaration] as b on a.[Machine Center No_] = b.[Machine Center No_] and a.[Date] = b.[Date] and a.[Work Shift] = b.[Work Shift] where cast(b.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: Machine Production Declaration Indirect Time
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Machine Center No_], a.[Date], a.[Work Shift], a.[Line No_], a.[Stop Code], a.[Observations], a.[Stop Start], a.[Stop End], a.[Indirect Time Min_], a.[No_of Workers], a.[Item No_ Stacked], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Machine Prod_Declar_Indir_Time] as a inner join [dbo].[Live_any$Machine Production Declaration] as b on a.[Machine Center No_] = b.[Machine Center No_] and a.[Date] = b.[Date] and a.[Work Shift] = b.[Work Shift] where cast(b.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: Vendor
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[No_], a.[Name], a.[Search Name], a.[Name 2], a.[Address], a.[Address 2], a.[City], a.[Contact], a.[Phone No_], a.[Telex No_], a.[Our Account No_], a.[Territory Code], a.[Global Dimension 1 Code], a.[Global Dimension 2 Code], a.[Budgeted Amount], a.[Vendor Posting Group], a.[Currency Code], a.[Language Code], a.[Statistics Group], a.[Payment Terms Code], a.[Fin_ Charge Terms Code], a.[Purchaser Code], a.[Shipment Method Code], a.[Shipping Agent Code], a.[Invoice Disc_ Code], a.[Country_Region Code], a.[Blocked], a.[Pay-to Vendor No_], a.[Priority], a.[Payment Method Code], a.[Last Date Modified], a.[Application Method], a.[Prices Including VAT], a.[Fax No_], a.[Telex Answer Back], a.[VAT Registration No_], a.[Gen_ Bus_ Posting Group], a.[GLN], a.[Post Code], a.[County], a.[E-Mail], a.[Home Page], a.[No_ Series], a.[Tax Area Code], a.[Tax Liable], a.[VAT Bus_ Posting Group], a.[Block Payment Tolerance], a.[IC Partner Code], a.[Prepayment _], a.[Partner Type], a.[Creditor No_], a.[Preferred Bank Account Code], a.[Cash Flow Payment Terms Code], a.[Primary Contact No_], a.[Responsibility Center], a.[Location Code], a.[Lead Time Calculation], a.[Base Calendar Code], a.[Document Sending Profile], a.[Identificator fabrica], a.[Default Bank Account Code], a.[Not VAT Registered], a.[Registration No_], a.[Commerce Trade No_], a.[Transaction Type], a.[Transaction Specification], a.[Transport Method], a.[Currency Transformation Index], a.[VAT to Pay], a.[Tip Partener], a.[Cod Judet D394], a.[Organization type], a.[Data inceput Split TVA], a.[Data inceput TVA de plata], a.[Data inceput TVA], a.[Data sfarsit TVA], a.[Data sfarsit TVA de plata], a.[Inactiv], a.[Data inactivare], a.[Data Reactivare], a.[Data anulare Split TVA], a.[Registru Plati Defalcate], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$Vendor] as a where cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: G/L Account
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[No_], a.[Name], a.[Search Name], a.[Account Type], a.[Global Dimension 1 Code], a.[Global Dimension 2 Code], a.[Account Category], a.[Income_Balance], a.[Debit_Credit], a.[No_ 2], a.[Blocked], a.[Direct Posting], a.[Reconciliation Account], a.[New Page], a.[No_ of Blank Lines], a.[Indentation], a.[Last Date Modified], a.[Totaling], a.[Consol_ Translation Method], a.[Consol_ Debit Acc_], a.[Consol_ Credit Acc_], a.[Gen_ Posting Type], a.[Gen_ Bus_ Posting Group], a.[Gen_ Prod_ Posting Group], a.[Automatic Ext_ Texts], a.[Tax Area Code], a.[Tax Liable], a.[Tax Group Code], a.[VAT Bus_ Posting Group], a.[VAT Prod_ Posting Group], a.[Exchange Rate Adjustment], a.[Default IC Partner G_L Acc_ No], a.[Omit Default Descr_ in Jnl_], a.[Account Subcategory Entry No_], a.[Cost Type No_], a.[Default Deferral Template Code], a.[Analytic_Synthetic1_Synthetic2], a.[Closing Account], a.[Check Posting Debit_Credit], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$G_L Account] as a where cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) > ?;

step.name: G/L Entry
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[Entry No_], a.[G_L Account No_], a.[Posting Date], a.[Document Type], a.[Document No_], a.[Description], a.[Bal_ Account No_], a.[Amount], a.[Global Dimension 1 Code], a.[Global Dimension 2 Code], a.[User ID], a.[Source Code], a.[System-Created Entry], a.[Prior-Year Entry], a.[Job No_], a.[Quantity], a.[VAT Amount], a.[Business Unit Code], a.[Journal Batch Name], a.[Reason Code], a.[Gen_ Posting Type], a.[Gen_ Bus_ Posting Group], a.[Gen_ Prod_ Posting Group], a.[Bal_ Account Type], a.[Transaction No_], a.[Debit Amount], a.[Credit Amount], a.[Document Date], a.[External Document No_], a.[Source Type], a.[Source No_], a.[No_ Series], a.[Tax Area Code], a.[Tax Liable], a.[Tax Group Code], a.[Use Tax], a.[VAT Bus_ Posting Group], a.[VAT Prod_ Posting Group], a.[Additional-Currency Amount], a.[Add_-Currency Debit Amount], a.[Add_-Currency Credit Amount], a.[Close Income Statement Dim_ ID], a.[IC Partner Code], a.[Reversed], a.[Reversed by Entry No_], a.[Reversed Entry No_], a.[Dimension Set ID], a.[Prod_ Order No_], a.[FA Entry Type], a.[FA Entry No_], a.[Custom Invoice No_], a.[Transfer Self-Invoice], a.[Amount (FCY)], a.[Debit Amount (FCY)], a.[Credit Amount (FCY)], a.[Currency Code], a.[Currency Factor], a.[Value Entry No_], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$G_L Entry] as a where a.[Entry No_] > ?;

step.name: G/L Item Ledger Relation
step.sourceQuery: select cast(a.[timestamp] as bigint) as [timestamp], a.[G_L Entry No_], a.[Value Entry No_], a.[G_L Register No_], current_timestamp as mod_de from [dbo].[Live_any$G_L - Item Ledger Relation] as a where a.[G_L Entry No_] > ?;
